predicate.note: Frames file for 'weigh' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Many senses. Comparison to 'measure' and 'press'.

roleset.name: determine the weight

example.name: and they're proud of this?
example.text: Conner is supplying hard-disk drives for the machine, which *trace* weighs only six pounds and fits in a briefcase.

example.name: agentive, with yardstick
example.text: Mary weighed John's brain with a postal scale.

roleset.note: Effectively this conflates two senses: "determine the weight of" and "have a certain weight". But they're so close!

example.name: typical usage
example.text: ...traders said profit-taking weighed on the market, with blue-chips bearing the brunt of the selling.
example.arg: with blue-chips bearing the brunt of the selling
